roleset.name: bend or turn backwards
roleset.note: RETROFLEX-V NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No Comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from retroflex.01-v)

example.name: VBN example (So the PP 'of the rectum' is outside the span)
example.text: Retroflexed view of the rectum revealed anal papilae.

example.name: With agent
example.text: [She-1] has to [*-1]retroflex her tongue to produce the sound.
